name: ada-radio-link
description: Interface for the FastRTC (WebRTC) VHF Radio System.

tools.name: get_radio_status
tools.description: Checks if the VHF Radio Node (FastRTC) is active and listening on Channel 72.

tools.name: broadcast_alert
tools.description: Injects a text message into the TTS engine to be broadcasted via voice on the radio channel.

message.description: The text to speak (e.g., 'Security Alert: Storm Approaching').
